title: Tomato â€” Spider mites (Two-spotted)
description: Fine webbing and stippled leaves caused by two-spotted spider mites; spray with water to dislodge and use miticides if severe.

treatment.chemical: Apply miticides such as abamectin or bifenthrin when mite populations become damaging.
treatment.organic: Spray with water to dislodge mites, use neem oil, release beneficial predatory mites, or apply horticultural oils.
